title: Event for International Committee
description: Annual international Islamic conference bringing together scholars, leaders, and global partners.
content: This annual conference organized by the International Committee focuses on contemporary challenges and opportunities facing Muslim communities worldwide. Scholars, intellectuals, and community leaders shared insights on education, technology, social welfare, and global cooperation. The event strengthened international networking and promoted unity across borders.

title: Event for Young Network
description: Interactive capacity-building workshop for youth focusing on technology, leadership, and entrepreneurship.
content: Organized under the Young Network, this workshop aimed to empower young professionals with modern skills in web development, digital marketing, and business management. Industry experts guided participants through practical sessions to prepare youth for leadership and innovation aligned with Islamic values.

title: Event for Qur'an Meaning Recitation Competition
description: Large-scale Qur'an meaning-based recitation and reflection competition for students.
content: This event focused on understanding the Qur'an with meaning and reflection. Hundreds of students participated in a structured recitation program combined with daily tracking, mentoring, and evaluation. The initiative strengthened Qur'anic attachment, discipline, and unity among participants across institutions.

title: Event for Ulama Committee
description: Scholarly Qur'an-based educational program guided by Islamic scholars.
content: Arranged by the Ulama Committee, this event emphasized Qur'anic understanding, scholarly guidance, and moral development. Senior scholars provided direction on sustaining Islamic learning environments and strengthening religious practice within academic and community life.

title: Event for Women Network
description: Ethical and intellectual development initiative highlighting Qur'anic values and leadership.
content: This program highlighted the moral and intellectual impact of Qur'an meaning-based study on leadership development. The event emphasized ethical awareness, inner discipline, and value-based leadership among students, particularly focusing on women's engagement and empowerment.

title: Movement for Free Palestine
description: Awareness and humanitarian support program focusing on Palestine.
content: This educational and advocacy event raised awareness about the humanitarian situation in Palestine. Through discussions, documentaries, and fundraising activities, participants expressed solidarity and contributed to humanitarian support efforts.

title: Event for Human Rights Committee
description: Conference addressing human rights, justice, and social responsibility.
content: Scholars and human rights advocates discussed key challenges affecting Muslim communities, including social justice, education rights, and welfare. The event promoted awareness and responsible civic engagement.

title: Event for Relief & Rehabilitation Committee
description: Community-focused program highlighting relief, recovery, and social support.
content: This event marked key initiatives of relief and rehabilitation activities. Community members gathered to reflect on humanitarian services, social recovery, and long-term welfare planning.

title: Event for Education & Research Committee
description: Educational development initiative focusing on knowledge and research.
content: The event highlighted academic growth through the opening of educational facilities and promotion of research-based Islamic studies. It aimed to foster a culture of learning and scholarship.

title: Event for Halal Finance & Banking Committee
description: Scholarship and financial support initiative promoting halal economic principles.
content: This program recognized academic excellence and provided financial assistance to deserving students. Discussions focused on halal finance, ethical banking, and sustainable economic development.

title: Event for Law & Shariah Committee
description: Religious outreach program promoting access to the Holy Qur'an.
content: This initiative focused on mass distribution of the Holy Qur'an to ensure accessibility and encourage regular recitation and understanding within communities.

title: Bangladesh Halal Expo 2026
description: Largest international halal trade and networking expo in Bangladesh.
content: Bangladesh Halal Expo 2026 serves as a global platform for halal trade, innovation, and ethical commerce. The event brings together international exhibitors, buyers, and policymakers to promote sustainable halal economic growth.

title: Event for Press & Publication Committee
description: Media and publication strategy workshop for ethical Islamic communication.
content: This event focused on strengthening press, publication, and media coordination. Discussions covered responsible journalism, documentation, digital publishing, and unified media guidelines for organizational outreach.

title: Event for IT Committee
description: Technology and digital transformation program for organizational development.
content: Organized by the IT Committee, this event addressed digital infrastructure, cybersecurity, automation, and innovative technology solutions to support Dawah, education, and administration.
